channel.title: How to make a .bat file with options (VIDEO)
channel.description:
[i]Hello Again![/i]
I decided to make a tutorial on how to make a .bat file/program with options. Im sick of the writing tut .. so I made a movie. I think that movie recording is going to get more popular for us in the future.
People have probably made it before, i dont know. But i made this anyway.
[b]Video:[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kv6_8M_1rAk
Credits: 100% me Bloop
More tut's will come soon ;)
